title: IWC All-Star Voting is Now Live!

replies.body:
Here is my picks and why:
Top: Chippys. Big Swips isn't the best top laner in OCE, he's just in the best team. He gets a lot of support from Spookz and when he doesn't he is regularly HAM with blinkers on and doesn't have the same prowess that Chippys has to 1v1. With the way the meta is shifting, Chippys has the better playstyle and champion pool to hold his own topside.

Mid: Swiffer. Hands down best Midlaner, second place isn't even close, pretty obvious choice (and also the choice we need given only 2 chiefs members can be selected). He has been known to tilt hard, but when he's on point, no midlaner in OCE can touch him.

Jungle: Carbon. I do feel like Spookz is the better jungler, but is he the BEST by far? No. Carbon is right at his heels and we need Carbon's leadership over Spookz ' slight skill ceiling.

ADC: K1ng. I actually am unsure whether this needs to be K1ng or Raes, and I would be happy with either. K1ng has more consistency over Raes, over a longer period of professional play, so I've slightly edged him up. Why not Raydere you may ask? I've been against Raydere for many years, not because I think that he isn't the number 1 adc in OCE, because he is. The problem lies in his ability to perform on the world stage. Against other OPL teams he shines and is almost always on his game, especially in his micro-play. This changes at international events, as I see his performance as a flip-of-the-coin. He doesn't seem to perform at his peak level, and for this reason, I feel as though someone else needs an opportunity to step up to the plate.  

Support: Egym. I will give my love to Rogue as a very close second, because I feel as though when Egym plays badly, he PLAYS REALLY BADLY, and can throw games. Rogue is so close to Egym and may even surpass him on a macro level, however Egym is the overall package when you also consider Micro-play, leadership and vocalisation. Overall I feel as though he is definitely the better pick, but the way I know that casuals are going to vote, Rogue will end up with a spot as he is the second most popular support, and likely 2 other chiefs members will get in over Egym, so if this does happen, then Rogue aka likeadontknowhowtospellrogueproperly (yeah you know the joke), I wish you all the best.

Heres my team:

Top: Sazahu - best top laner by far, you just never saw much of him. After leaving OCE he went on trial for SK Telecom T1.

Jungle: Spookz - this is related to the synergy with mid lane.

Mid: Swiffer - Shotcaller, playmaker, GOD. No one in OCE matches what he brings to a team.

ADC: Raydere - Not washed up yet boys, get him out of retirement!!

Support : Rosey - YAY the old Chiefs bot lane, let's do it! Remember when they were winning early on against CJ Entus in 2013? xD

Summary: 4 Chiefs and a Korean GOD... winning. This probably won't happen though, cos of you Big Swips fans. And Carbon will probably get the jungle role just by default (can't vote for more than 2 Chiefs).
who is sazahu? can u plz tell me whats his id in oce or korea or any server plz???? thanksss
[Here is a good game from the OPL](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Qc9oMIwo5EY&t=8m08s) that demonstrates my point above, and also the language barrier issues.

i dont remember seeing sazahu in the opl

also i think paring Lost up with the best support oce has to offer would be better than raydere and rosey, if you recall raydere and egym(who many consider to be an upgrade over rosey) lost lane to lost and rosey
Can't have more than 2 Tainted Minds guys in the same team unfortunately. But anyways I don't rate Lost over Raydere. Laning and mechanics are good, but he is terrible at macro play.

Top: Pacman. Threw down with the best all season. I love Swips but I'm handicapped with the 2 per team. Also he's popular with the other team members. 

Jungle: Sybol. When he's firing, he didn't lose. Put him in the right team and that'll happen a lot more. Carbon would not fit in a team with Egym and Swiffer. Ever. Impaired also would have been well suited to this team, and as with top I'm handicapped by the 2 per team, sorry Sammy.

Mid: Swiffer. There was no slight consideration of anyone else. Man's the god of OCE.

ADC: Raydere. Holding the top 2 spots in OCE solo queue for as long as he did wasn't an accident. He knows his role. He knows his support. He's the king.

Support: Egym. Only other consideration was Rosey. Best synergy, best results.

Top: Tally
Jungle: Carbon
Mid: Swiffer
ADC: Raydere
Support EGym

Figure putting Raydere with EGym gives the strongest bot lane possible WITHOUT locking out the rest of Chiefs ;) (Or locking out any other team by using a complete bot lane duo)

Swiffer MID because hes the best we have

And then with that Chiefs are locked out so Carbon along side his Top laner makes the most sense to me for a strong pair to round out the team

2.) Me 5 year old son, he's beaten DOOM Nightmare mode on PS4 but hasnt figured out the complexity of a mouse and keyboard (yet), we should be able to get that solved by All Stars.
3.) Me 60 year old dad who only uses a PC for emails.
4.) Me Mum, coz she always interrupting my gaming for dinna she has heaps of experience dealing with gamers (me bro and I)
5.) Me dog, 1 year old scottish Terrier named Wrynn, would be great in the jungle always killing animals, watches the screen so much definately has more map awareness than either S****Z or C****n.
6.) Me, Coz im in gold I have to be better than those boosted bronze bonobo's in our "professional" teams.
7.) Me Gran, (Coz she's my Meemaw, and we've finally got her skyping my uncle and cousins in UK, wont take too much more training to get her up to the "professional" australian scene level)
8.) Me grandma, cept shes dead, though if you know how to bring he back to life we'd have more chance with her as a zombie with her fine detail painting skills, would definately transfer to gaming.
9.) Our 8 pond goldfish combined, coz them drowning in the air flopping on Q, W, E, R, shift, left and right mousekeys, capslock(voip button) would be more successful than our current choice of Lemurs
10.) You.
fair enough... {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
That was the most beautiful thing I have ever read in my entire life. xD

Top: Tally
Jungle: Spookz
Mid: Swiffer
Adc: Raydere
Support: Rosey

Top:Tally
Jungle:Spookz
Mid:Swiffer
Support:Cuden
Adc:Raes

Just going to add to this. My prediction of who is ACTUALLY going to get picked: 

4 Chiefs (including ex Chiefs), Swiper, Swiffer, Rosey and Raydere (with Raydere and Rosey no longer on Chiefs they will qualify and be on the team)
The reason this will happen is it takes the biggest margin to pick the 2 members from each team. As Swiper and Swiffer will have a bigger differential between first and second most favourite picks for their respective roles, it means even though Egym has the most votes for support, he will miss out and the second most popular support will get in, which it seems will be Rosey (although I wish it was Rogue).
1 Carbon - obvious reasons are obvious

I wish it didn't have to go this way, as we are going to end up with just about the same team that usually makes world stage and quite frankly, chokes more than not (you may hate my opinion especially the fact that I am just a low ranked scrub, but it is pretty much a fact as history has shown). I wish this was decided by the pros and casters not the viewers, because analysis and strategy would go into it giving us a better chance to have the best winning team, rather than just a popularity contest where the same people are going to be voted in every year because Chiefs have the most renown/followers/likes. Oh well, this is how it is, so best of luck to the guys mentioned above, I hope you all do us proud and I will be rooting for you despite my comments, OPL pride!

And of course the biggest issue with, what i will agree with you is the most likely result, is that it means Carbon is alone with no players he can rely on or have innate synergy with. And jungle is heavily reliant on synergy with lanes. the ideal situation is to have egym support for a solid reliable bot lane, and Tally get the top lane spot, giving Carbon (the obvious jungle spot) someone he can trust and rely on.

From a support Point of view, I think something people aren't looking at is the synchronisation of two players duo bot from the same team. I mean, wouldn't two people who played pro league together for a season do better then one that just got matched for the all star event??

Just my opinion though.

Top: Chippys
Jungle: Carbon or Spookz
Mid: Swiffer
ADC: Raydere
Support: Egym

I got some picks for you, 
Top - Chippys. 
Firstly because its my nickname (I don't even kid you, my last name is Chipman :P). Secondly because he definently is one of the best tops in the OCE currently if not the best. This is mainly because of the 1v1 meta of top lane, even if its a team game you have to have someone who will win his lane well. 
Jungler - Spookz, his teamwork with Swiffer and Raes (my adc pick) is second to none, he gives great pressure in the jungle and has a decent champion pool. 
Mid - Swiffer.
mechanics, micro, reaction time & teamwork, this guy has all of it, he's a perfect leader for teams and has the mechanics to play what the team needs. 
Support - Rogue
I think he'd work well with Raes.
Adc - Raes
He has stepped up so much in his play, going to dire wolves then Chiefs. He has enough experience that we should give him a chance and I love when he plays well, its my favourite to watch.
